start_message.english:
*Welcome to Licensure!*
Start monetizing your content with us!

read_rules.english:
*Buying Licenses*

1.🚀 Click the *Let's Go!* button to get started.**
2. **🔐 Authenticate using one of the many supported TON wallets.**
3. **🛍️ Browse through the offers on the P2P market and choose the one you like.**
4. **💳 Click the *Buy* button and follow the on-screen instructions.**

*Selling Licenses*

1. **👤 Go to your profile by clicking on the profile icon.**
2. **📢 Click the *Create Ad* button.**
3. **📝 Fill in all the required fields.**
4. **📣 Click the *Post Ad* button.**
5. **🖥️ Follow the on-screen instructions.**

Licensure makes it easy to find and trade the licenses you need. Join us today and experience seamless transactions in a secure and user-friendly environment! 🌐🔒

for_menu.english: The bot is navigated through the menu at the bottom👇

description.english:
Licensure - a peer-to-peer crypto platform enabling authors to monetize their media content by providing intellectual property for various purposes, including education, entertainment, advertising, neural network training, and mass media. 📈💡

Tailor your own terms and effortlessly transfer rights of use or ownership through smart contracts. 🔐✨

stop.english: You stopped the bot, to start it again enter - /start
